main event: Three objects were observed changing colors in the night sky in Aberdeen, South Dakota on 4 December 1965.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 20 minutes.,The objects appeared as brilliant stars changing colors from white to red to blue to green.,One object was slowly moving downward while the other two remained stationary.,No photographs were taken of the sighting.,Weather conditions during the sighting were clear with mild winds.
sighted object: three color-changing objects in the sky
witness description: a reliable civilian and a police department representative
